english: Ahh!

text: Bugüne kadar üzerimizde çok hakkın vardır
english: You've got a lot of rights on us.
I'm sparing your life.

text: Lakin bir daha sakın karşıma çıkma Ertuğrul
english: But don't ever come near me again, Ertugrul.
Or I'll be your reaper
Treacherous dogs.
What is Ahval Tugtekin?
Ah, here's the thing, the Apricots' Alps...
...is the property of Noyan.

text: Obadaki her Kayı ileride Noyan’ın malı olabilir
english: Every Apricot in the Oba could be the property of Noyan.
How can we live with so many traitors?
The men of Dodurga surrendered to their anger.
They mix the straw with the handle

text: Ben de derim ki; Kayılar toydaki vazifelerinden el çeksin
english: And I say, let the apricots withdraw from their duties in the green.

text: Ya da Alpleri pusatlarını teslim etsin
english: Or the Alps will hand over their pusats.
And let Abdurrahman be executed

text: Bu, Kayıları emir erimiz yapmak demektir
english: That means making the Apricots our order.

text: Onlar bizim emir erimiz bile olamaz
english: They can't even be our orders.
Oh, that's enough to lead our packs.
What do you think, sir?
Sir?
Allah!
Something's happened to my master.
Mr. Scare!
Dad!
Mr. Scare, are you all right?
Let him breathe.
Help me. Are you all right, sir?
Take off your robe.
Get some water!
If your father, Solomon, was still alive...
What would he say to you people, huh?
What would he say?
We've been through a lot of trouble.
♪ We got rid of all the sherry ♪
We need unity, unity.
What about you?
How will you face the people?

text: Bu vakitten sonra bir daha birbirinize el kaldırırsanız…
english: If you ever raise your hand to each other again after this time...
I won't give you my blessing.
I don't drink my milk.
Did you hear my words?
Give me a hug and give me your blessing.
Give me your blessing, brother.

text: Helal olsun Sen de helal et kardeşim
english: Good for you too, brother.
Way to go.

text: Hainliğiniz yetmedi, şimdi de bize kafa mı tutarsınız siz?
english: Your treachery wasn't enough, and now you're going to stand up to us?
Huh?
Huh?
This flag won't stand here!

text: Senin gücün Kayı Beyi'nin emanetine mi yeter Tuğtekin?
english: Is your power enough for Mr. Kayi's trust, Tugtekin?

text: Unutma ki bu basit bir bez parçası değildir
english: Remember, it's not just a piece of cloth.
To remove his anger from his heritage
It doesn't suit an Alpine like you.
Ertugrul!
Tugtekin!
Enough!
Enough!
Drop that sword!
What do you want?
It's time, Abdurrahman.
What kind of dirty grin do you have, traitor?
What's the matter with you that I'm doomed?
Neither the brain can decide.
Only my Lord, the Most High, gives.
Sir, it's exactly what you wanted.
He's got his hand wrapped tight
Let's hope it heals.
Thanks to you
I don't have a broken hand anymore.
I've got a steel hand
Uncle!
If you delay the execution
Our Alps are ready to drop their pusats.
If that's the way it is.
Dad!

text: Yapma bunu. Ver şu idam emrini
english: Don't do this.
Execution postponed
Sir, the tent is on fire.
Which tent?
It's a caged tent, sir.
God damn it!
God damn it!
God damn it!

text: Seni alçak! Sen kaçırdın değil mi?
english: You bastard, you kidnapped him, didn't you?

text: Bu ne densizlik Tuğtekin! Kim kimi kaçırdı? Ne dersin sen?
english: Who kidnapped who, what do you think?

text: Kafesli çadır yandı Abdurrahman içinde yok
english: The caged tent burned down. Abdurrahman's not in it.
Is it true, Ertuğrul?

text: Ne yangından ne de Abdurrahman'dan haberim vardır ana
english: I don't know about the fire or Abdurrahman, Ana.

text: Tuğtekin ve Alpleri emanete sahip çıkamamışlar
english: Tugtekin and the Alps couldn't take care of the trust.
You're too young, too young
You've overstepped your bounds.
Ertuğrul, let go.
You'll kill him!
Tugtekin!

text: Bir daha benim otağıma böyle girersen ecelin benim elimden olur!
english: If you ever go in my tent like that again, your death will be at my hands!
As for you, Ertuğrul

text: Bu işi yapıp yapmadığından emin değilim
english: I'm not sure if he did it or not.

text: O yüzden bir süre obadan uzak durasın
english: So stay away from the oba for a while.
I know the fire inside you, Ma.
My heart boils and my soul boils
When your brother's hand holds no sword
I threw it in the Mongol's lap.
What if he falls prisoner?
What if the wolf gets eaten by the bird?

text: Allah korusun ana. Hem bilmez misin benim kardeşim dokuz canlıdır
english: And don't you know my brother's got nine lives?
He'll get over it.
Inshallah, son.
Inshallah.

text: Sen içini ferah tut ana. Her müşkülün devası elbet Allah'tandır
english: (Muhammad), make your mind at ease.
Even if I had a tongue
If I hadn't told you
You can't get away from me this time, Ertugrul.

text: Dağılın. Her tarafı didik didik arayın hadi!
english: Spread out, search every inch of the place!
Treacherous dogs!
I'm the new master of Oban Ertugrul
Other than that, you're going to swear to me.
Here, here!
Wipe your tears off my face
I don't want your troubles to be a burden to you.

text: Evladım daha doğmadan acıyla yoldaş oldu Selcan
english: My son was a companion in pain before he was born Selcan
Before he was born, he met the flames of hell.
Mr. Ertugrul will soon return to his office.
And Mother Hayme will forgive him

text: Bir ana kendi evladını nasıl obasından kovar ha? Nasıl?
english: How can a mother expel her own child from her obama?
My Ertugrul's hand hasn't healed yet.
He hasn't recovered yet.

text: Başımızda bunca düşman varken bir ana
english: With so many enemies at our disposal, we have a mother.

text: kendi evladını nasıl ölümün kollarına atar Selcan?
english: How could he throw his own son into the arms of death, Selcan?

text: Hayme Ana'nın ağzından öfkeyle döküldü o kelamlar Halime
english: The words were poured out of the mouth of Mother Hayme.
Let him pour out his anger on his brother!
Let him pour it on his brother's snake-tongued wife!
What's my recruit's fault?
What's the Sin of Halima?
Where are you going?
Let go Selcan Hatun, let go
I'm going to throw up my anger.
Halima!
Hayme Ana!
Hayme Ana!

text: Oğlunu obadan kovmaya gönlün nasıl razı geldi ha?
english: How'd you like to kick your son out of the room, huh?
How did your tongue say it?
To leave me without a soldier, my child without a father
How did you feel about it?
My daughter.
What do you say?

text: Duymasını bilene çok şey söylerim ana
english: I say a lot of things to anyone who knows how to hear.
He won't get far.
So you want to play games with us?
So be it, Ertuğrul.
Let's go.
Your son.

text: Ertuğrul'unu kendi ellerinle cehenneme attın Hayme Ana
english: You threw your Ertuğrul into hell with your own hands.
Halima

text: ağzından çıkanı kulağın duysun bir evvela
english: Listen to what you're saying.
You want me to hear it?

text: Korkut'un çadırında medet beklemeyi bıraktın da
english: You stopped waiting for help in Korkur's tent.

text: şimdi bize akıl mı verirsin Gündoğdu Bey?
english: Are you going to advise us now, Mr. Gündüz?
Know your place, your place!

text: Sen kimsin ki Hayme Ana'ya Gündoğdu Bey'e dil uzatırsın?
english: Who are you to insult Hayme Ana and Mr. Gündüz?

text: Şimdi otağına git, dizini kır erinin yolunu gözle
english: Now go to your tent, break your knee, and watch for the way to melt.
Now!
Mother Hayme!
Pick it up, sir.
Get him up, sir.
Main
Now come on, coyotes.
His power is diminished.
Stay alert.
Tangut
It's this way.
Let's go, Hamza.
What do we do now?
Süleyman Shah's son Ertuğrul
You won't get away.

text: Hepimiz dağılalım. Siz o taraftan Siz şu taraftan
english: You go that way, you go that way.

text: Siz de beni takip edin. Hadi!
english: You guys follow me.
The hunt was ambushed.
The burden of the Oban is on your back.
The sorrow is in the heart of Hayme Hatun

text: Tez vakitte o kederi söküp atın yüreğinizden
english: Remove that sorrow from your heart at a time
All this grief, all this pain.
Which heart will last?

text: Dayanırsın anam sen Allah'ın izniyle ona da dayanırsın
english: You will have patience, my mother, and you will have faith in God by His will.
Mix this with water and make syrup.
I hope he'll be all right.
Excuse me.
I'll see you out.
You can pick up the stuff.

text: Allah senden razı olsun Artuk Bey
english: God bless you, Mr. Artuk.
Take good care of your mother, sir.

text: Anam; acıyla, kederle gamla kardeş olmuştur
english: My mother has become a sister of pain and sorrow
May Allah keep him in check.
Amen.
We need you, Mother Hayme.
Don't go anywhere.
You messed up the Oba, it wasn't enough.

text: Nice erimiz senin yüzünden şehit düştü, yetmedi
english: Many of us have been martyred because of you, it's not enough.
You've ruined Ertugrul, it's not enough
Is it Hayme's turn now?

text: Eğer Hayme Ana'ya bir şey olursa seni kendi ellerimle öldürürüm
english: If anything happens to Hayme Ana, I'll kill you myself.
Damn it!
Damn it!

text: Bulun onu bana Bulun onu bana. Yürü!
english: Find him for me, find him for me.

text: Nöbetçi diye diktiğin adamları bulup bir bir cezalandıracaksın
english: You'll find the men you call guards and punish them one by one.
Do you understand me?
Ertuğrul was always in front of me, my lord.

text: Abdurrahman'ı kaçıranın o olması mümkün değil
english: There's no way he's the one who took Abdurrahman.
What about the Alps?

text: Alpler çadıra yanaşmadı beyim Kendi çadırlarındaydılar
english: The Alps didn't go near the tent, sir. They were in their tent.
I've had him followed all day.
Then how did he get away?

text: Beyim, bu işin içinde bir iş var
english: Sir, there's something going on here.

text: Belli ki seni ve Tuğtekin'i çekemeyenlerin gadrine uğradınız
english: You've obviously been to the gadrine of those who can't pull you and Tugtekin.

text: Birileri el ele verip sizin itibarınızla oynar
english: Someone will join hands and play with your reputation.
Unfortunately, they did that, too.
I'll go find them.
Tugtekin
You shouldn't go anywhere.

text: Bu iş içinden çıkılamaz hale gelmemeli
english: This can't get out of hand.
You should stay in the room.

text: Kocabaş! En iyi Alplerini al yanına Yola koyulun, peşlerine düşün
english: Bighead, get your best Alps on the road, follow them.

text: Ertuğrul'u da, Alplerini de Abdurrahman'ı da bulun, getirin
english: Bring Ertubrul and Al-Abdurrahman.
Now.
Go find them.

text: Bul, kimsenin gözünün yaşına da bakma
english: Find out, don't look anyone in the eye
Don't worry, sir.

text: Eğer onları bulamazsan seni bu obanın ortasında kırbaçlarım Kocabaş
english: If you don't find them, I'll whip you right in the middle of this hatch, Sasquatch.
Let's go now.

text: Sen kal burada Sen, sen, gelin benimle
english: You stay here You, you, come with me
Go, go, go.
You and your loved ones
If I don't send him to hell
Let the earth drink my blood
Move!

text: Hekim iken sayenizde ne hallere düştük
english: And how was it with you when you were a physician?
How can I repay you, sir?
You pray to Turalı
Now take these and put them on.

text: Aman Artuk Bey'im. Bu vakitten sonra bir avrat kılığına girmediğimiz kalmıştı
english: Mr. Artuk, it's been a long time since we've been in disguise.

text: Yahu gündüz vakti bu obadan nasıl kaçmayı hayal etmiştin ha?
english: How did you dream of running away from this oba during the day, huh?

text: Hadi uzatma. Al giy hadi. Hadi
english: Come on, put it on.

text: Abdurrahman, Ertuğrul Bey, Alpleri Doğan ya da Turgut
english: Abdurrahman, Ertugrul Bey, Alperi Doğan or Turgut

text: karşımıza kim çıkarsa alıp obaya getirme görevi verildi
english: We've been tasked with picking up whoever comes our way.
If anyone opposes, his blood is lawful.
It's a rule, you know.
Where are we going?

text: Siz hazırlıkları yapın Ben Artuk Bey'e gideceğim
english: You make the arrangements. I'll go to Artuk Bey.

text: Hadi fırla Turalı Etrafı kolla sen
english: Let's go, Turalı. Watch the perimeter.

text: Atın hazır Abdurrahman Geyikli'nin mağarasına gideceksin
english: Your horse is ready. You will go to Abdurrahman Deer's cave.
Turalı will take you to your horse.
Thank you, sir.
Come on, hurry up.
As-salaam alaikum, sir.
Hello, Big Head.
What's up?
Abdurrahman's body is missing.

text: o vakit nasıl kaçmış? Anlayabildiniz mi beyim?
english: How did he escape then?

text: Sizin gibi gözü oynaşta Alpler nöbet tuttukça
english: As long as the Alps are on guard as you dawdle your eyes
More traitors run away, Sasquatch.

text: Hayme Ana için hazırladığınız şifa şurubundan az daha almaya geldim
english: I've come to get some more of the medicine you prepared for Mother Hayme.
I'll get right on it, Selcan Hatun.
Did you want something, Sasquatch?
No, sir, if you'll excuse me.
Don't worry about it anymore, mama.

text: Allah'ın izniyle bu müşkülün de üstesinden geleceğiz
english: With Allah's permission, we will overcome this hardship.
My devoted, wise son.
Inshallah.
Inshallah.
Is there a sign, Hayme Ana?
Come, Dumrul, come.

text: Kocabaş Alpleri toplamış Peşlerine düşecekler, Hayme Ana
english: Big Head has gathered the Alps They'll come after them, Hayme Ana
They're obviously willing to fight.

text: Abdurrahman'ın kaçışını Ertuğrul Bey'imize bağlarlar ana
english: They'll tie Abdurrahman's escape to Mr. Ertugrul.
What did you say?
Ana, you're tired, let me talk to my uncle.

text: Yetti gayrı evlat. Bunlara had bildirmenin zamanı geldi de geçiyor bile
english: That's it, kid, it's time to kick some ass.

text: Evladımı kovduğum halde peşine adam takmak da ne demek oluyor ha?
english: What's that supposed to mean, putting a tail on you when I fired my kid, huh?
Are they trying to kill you?
Ertugrul!

text: Kaç akçeye sattın obanı hain köpek?
english: How many coins did you sell the obans for, you traitorous dog?

text: Ben masumdum Ertuğrul Ağabeyin Gündoğdu bana inanmadı
english: I was innocent. Your brother Ertugrul. He didn't believe me.
He accused me of treason.

text: Onun için defalarca gözümü kırpmadan ölüme atıldım ben
english: I've been thrown to death over and over again.
I put him in my father's place.
I didn't deserve any of this.

text: Gündoğdu Bey bunları yaptı diye mi Noyan'ın iti oldun?
english: Is it because Mr. Gündüz did this that you became Noyan's dog?
Ertugrul!
I'll make you regret being born
Archer
Archer!
This can't go on, sir.

text: İki oba da bu sancıyı kaldıramaz
english: Both obas can't handle the pain.

text: Er ya da geç Ertuğrul'un içimize attığı yalazlar hepimizi yakıp kavurur
english: Sooner or later, the licks that Ertugrul puts in us will burn us all to death.

text: Ertuğrul'u anası gönderdi Gitti artık o
english: Her mother sent Ertugrul. She's gone now.
Yes
What if Hayme did it?

text: Senin ağzından çıkanı kulağın duyar mı kadın?
english: Will you listen to yourself, woman?
If he spends the alp, which is the memory of the brain.

text: diğer Alplerin gözünde itibarı yok olacaktı
english: His reputation would be destroyed in the eyes of the other Alps.

text: Belki de bundan korktu Bu işi kendi halletti
english: Maybe he was afraid of it. He took care of it himself.
By sending Ertuğrul too
He silenced us in his mind

text: Oğluna bile acımayarak bir Kayı anası olduğunu gösterdin Hayme Ana
english: You didn't even pity your son, so you showed him that you're a mother of Abyss, Hayme Ana.
I'll show you my motherhood.

text: abim nedense ne dayılığını ne de beyliğini gösteremez Aytolun ha
english: For some reason my brother can't show his uncle or his fiefdom Aytolun.
♪ He knows he'll show ♪ ♪ Hayme ♪

text: Bana bak Aytolun benim babamın obasında…
english: Look, Aytol's in my father's room...

text: …sakın ola ki bana bey avratlığı taslama
english: Don't patronize me.

text: Seni geldiğin yere öyle bir gönderirim ki…
english: I'll send you back where you came from.
Ohh!

text: Her horoz kendi çöplüğünde ötemezmiş demek ki
english: Not every rooster can sing on his own turf.

text: İnşallah bu zor günleri de atlatacağız beylerim
english: Hopefully we'll get through this, gentlemen.

text: Alplerini, oğlum ve Alplerinin peşinden göndermişsin
english: You sent your Alps after my son and his Alps.

text: Hain gibi, katil gibi, eşkıya gibi…
english: Like a traitor, like a murderer, like a bandit...
They say you've got a man on your back.
What could I do if I didn't let go, Hayme?

text: Benim vazifem; törenin, toyun emirlerini yerine getirip…
english: My duty is to carry out the order of the ceremony...
...to keep the room peaceful, right?
Huh!

text: Kardeşi kardeşe kırdırarak mı huzur getireceksin?
english: You're going to bring peace to the brother by offending him?
If they're not involved...

text: …Alplerimin peşinden tırısla obaya gelir, oturur konuşuruz
english: ...we'll go after my albums and we'll sit down and talk.
...if they've kidnapped Abdurrahman...

text: …o zaman da töre gereği bedelini öderler
english: ...then they'll have to pay for it.
You're going the wrong way, brother.
You're going the wrong way.
If someone gets a nosebleed...
I'll ask you to pay for it.
What's going on, Dad?

text: Halan hainlerin peşine adam salmamıza gocunmuş Tuğtekin
english: Your aunt's got a problem with us sending people after traitors, Tugtekin.

text: Bunca vakittir bağrımıza bastık da ne oldu hala?
english: What's happened to us all this time?
Look, they've kidnapped Abdurrahman
Aren't you tired of living with traitors?
Wait a minute, Tugtekin.
Don't fuel the fire
Uncle
Main
Didn't we gather the green here?

text: Bir olacağız, birlik olacağız demedik mi?
english: Didn't we say we'd be united?
Didn't we take an oath?
Now what the hell is this?
We fell apart on the first wind.
That's the way it was supposed to be.
We did, son, and we said...

text: …lakin ben evladımı biçare vaziyette obadan kovdum
english: ...and I cast my child out of the obama, helpless.

text: Peşine adam takmak ne demek? Ha?
english: What do you mean, put a tail on him?

text: Ben obamı yeteri kadar tehlikeye attım Hayme
english: I've put my oba in enough danger, Hayme.
I've opened my stove for you.
But I've run out of patience

text: O hainler er ya da geç buraya gelecek
english: Those traitors will come here sooner or later.
Thank you. Find it.

text: İnşallah bu işte senin dahlin yoktur Hayme
english: I hope you're not involved in this, Hayme.

text: Aslında Hayme Ana da biliyor olup biteni
english: As a matter of fact, Mother Hayme knows what's going on.

text: Ama ortalık daha fazla karışmasın diye susar
english: But he shuts up so it doesn't get any more complicated.
Have a nice day.

text: Ertuğrul Bey de anasından hak ettiği sürgünü aldığına göre…
english: And since Mr. Ertugrul got the exile he deserved from his mother...
...now our obas will be at peace.
Isn't that right, Crazy Iron?

text: Kafanızı kuma gömerseniz huzur muzur kalmaz Aytolun Hatun
english: If you bury your head in the sand, there won't be any peace, Aytolin Hatun.
As trouble gallops upon us...
You didn't put peace in the dorm because it was peaceful.

text: Çolak eliyle gaza hayalleri kuranları iyi biliriz biz
english: We know well those who dream with their hands on gas

text: Niceleri yılkı atlar gibi savaş meydanlarında telef olmuşlardır
english: Many were destroyed on the battlefields like horses of the year.

text: Cenk sadece kılıçla yapılmaz Aytolun Hatun
english: Cenk is not only made with sword Aytolin Hatun
It's done with heart, with tongue

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im de yüreğinden geçenleri dile döktü
english: Ertuğrul Bey also expressed what was in his heart.

text: Ama siz o kadar kör o kadar sağır…
english: But you're so blind, so deaf...

text: …ve hatta yüreğiniz o kadar mühürlenmiş ki…
english: ...and even your heart is so sealed...
Enough, Crazy Iron!
Enough.

text: Ben senin vazifeni demir dövmek diye bilirdim
english: I thought your job was to beat iron.
But you still haven't beaten your tongue.
It's a shame.
She's worse than a snake.
He's obviously suspicious of us.
It's the mouth that's looking for it.
Be careful what you say to her.

text: Fazla bir arada görünmesek iyi olur
english: We'd better not be seen together too much.
You're right, sir. You're right.

text: Ya nerede kaldı bunlar Turgut kardeş?
english: Where the hell are they, Brother Turgut?

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im arkanızdan gelecek dedi ya Doğan
english: Mr. Ertugrul said he'd come after you, Doğan.

text: E niye hâlâ yoklar o vakit?
english: So why are they still gone?
Or when Abdurrahman escaped from the caged tent...
Is it possible that something happened to them?
Enough is enough.
You're right, Brother Turgut. I'm sorry.
Abdurrahman
What's the matter, Brother Abdurrahman?
You're a loose cannon.

text: Bir kuş gördüm ormanda Dönüp dolaşırdı muallak havada
english: I saw a bird wandering in the woods in the uncertain air
I brought him to the poor man's nest

text: Bir bu kılığa girmediğimiz kalmıştı Sonunda onu da becerdik ya
english: We didn't get into that disguise. We ended up fucking her, too.

text: Kardeşler, karada bize ölüm yok demektir
english: Brothers, there is no death for us on land
Calm down, ma'am. Don't worry.
They can't find Ertugrul even if they follow him.

text: Ne Ertuğrul’u ne de Alplerini bulamazlar
english: They can't find Ertugrul. They can't find the Alps.

text: Onu bulamayacaklarını ben de bilirim Gündoğdu
english: I know they won't find him. It's daylight.

text: Lakin evladımın peşine adam takmak ne iştir, ha?
english: But what's it like to put a tail on my kid, huh?
Not as a mother...
...and as the master of this oban...

text: …Korkut’un evladım hakkında çıkardığı fermanı nasıl kabul ederim?
english: ...How can I accept the decree that Fear has issued about my son?
As if banishment wasn't enough...
He let his dogs go after him.
Tell me it's daylight!

text: Kendi dilimle sürgün ettim Daha ne edecektim?
english: I banished it with my own tongue. What was I supposed to do?
Did I make fun of you?
I don't know what's going on, Ma.

text: Lakin Ertuğrul’u ikimiz de çok iyi tanırız
english: But we both know Ertugrul very well.

text: Başını belaya sokmaktan geri durmayacağını da biliriz
english: We know you won't stop getting into trouble.
If he did something like that...

text: …hem babanın hem de Kayı’nın onurunu kurtarmıştır
english: ...saving the honor of both your father and Kaiy.
What do you think, Ma?
We're in a lot of trouble.

text: …toyun kararı, törenin emri diye diye Ertuğrul açmadı mı?
english: Ertugrul didn't open the order of the ceremony?

text: Şimdi töremiz, toyumuz itibarsız mı oldu?
english: Is it our custom, our naivety, to be disreputable now?
How is that stupid?

text: Belki de diyeceğimi en başta demeliydim
english: Maybe I should have said what I said in the first place.

text: Zavallı ve düşkün bir hâlde ağamın obasına sığındığım zaman söylemeliydim
english: I should've told you when I took refuge in my brother's office, poor and needy.

text: Abimin teklifini kabul etmekle çok büyük hata etmişim. Çok
english: I was so wrong to accept my brother's offer.
Ana...
Go away, my son.
Let's go. It's daylight.

text: Eksik bir şey kaldı mı? Kalmadı Aytolun Hanım
english: Is there anything missing?

text: Tüccar Efrasiyab gelmeden hazırlıkların hepsi bitmiş olacak
english: The preparations will be complete before Trader Efrasiab arrives.
Good.

text: Böyle bir günde gözlerinin içi güldüğüne göre…
english: Since your eyes are smiling on a day like this...
...must be good news.

text: Gökçe benimle Erzurum’a gelmeyi kabul etti ana
english: Gökçe has agreed to come with me to Erzurum, Mother
That's good news.

text: Döşeğini süsleyene dek gayrı durmak yok
english: Don't stop until you've decorated your floor.
In the evening, call Gökçe to the tent

text: Babamla anam seninle yemek yemek isterler de
english: My mom and dad would love to have dinner with you.
Do you understand?
Yes, ma'am.
Don't you dare...

text: …bu cavcavlı günler geçene kadar Hayme Ana’nın kalbini kırma
english: Don't break Hayme Ana's heart until these days are over.

text: Gökçe’yi döşeğine alıp, avrat yapmana engel bir tek o var bu cihanda
english: He's the only one who can stop you from taking the sky on your mattress and making a fool out of it.
Don't forget.

text: Öyle ya da böyle Ertuğrul belasından kurtulduk
english: One way or another, we're out of Ertugrul's misery.

text: Vakti gelince Hayme de köşesine çekilecek
english: When the time comes, Hayme will retire too.
That's when...

text: …Dodurga ile Kayı’nın sırtı bir daha yere gelmez
english: ...Doduga and Kaiyeh's back will never come back.

text: Yeter ki başımızda babanla sen olasın oğul
english: As long as it's you and your father in charge, son.
He got away from me again.

text: O kaçtıkça, içim daha da daralmakta
english: The more he runs away, the tighter I get.

text: Ruhlar bana onu tutmamı mı söylemekte?
english: Spirits telling me to hold him?
It's like if I don't hold Ertugrul...
Everything seems to be going to waste.

text: Ruhlar bana ne der Ulu Bilge?
english: What do the spirits call me, Great Sage?
Ertugrul beat the shit out of you.
You're lucky I saved your life.
What is Noyan worth with a shaman?
He talks to the spirits.

text: Ulu ruhların ona ne söylediğini öğrenmek ister
english: He wants to know what the great spirits say to him.

text: Ruhlar ne kelam eder Ulu Bilge?
english: What do the spirits say, Great Sage?
If the carotid artery of Ertugrul is not cut off...
...the earth will be his.
And his children...
...will have everything on earth.

text: Onu ve onun sahip olacağı her şeyi mahvedeceğim
english: I'm gonna ruin her and everything she's gonna have.
Everything!
Ertugrul Bey is here.
Sir, are you all right?
Help me get this off.
Sir, what happened?
Tangut followed me along with Hamza.
Son of a bitch.
They're after us, too.

text: Artık obada Noyan’ın bir adamı olduğuna adım gibi eminim
english: I'm pretty sure he's a man of Obada Noyan.
They're following every step of our way.
A new Kurdoglu, huh?
On the way to ambush Noyan...
When we left the cabin, they ambushed us.
Now if he attacked you...

text: haklısın beyim Obada bir hain var
english: You're right, sir. There's a traitor in Obada.

text: Onu bulup çıkarmadan bize huzur gelmez
english: We can't rest until we find him and get him out.
What are we going to do, sir?
We're Obama-free now.
We don't have Alps.

text: Bir pusatlarımız bir de yüreğimiz var
english: We've got a stroller and a heart.
We'll be martyrs...
Or we'll take the heads of coyotes.

text: Seninle ölüme gitmek bizim için şereftir beyim
english: It's an honor to go to death with you, my lord.
Then listen to me carefully.

text: Bundan sonra onların anladığı dilden konuşacağız
english: From now on, we'll speak their language.
What do you mean, sir?
Aytolun Hatun invited me to dinner
He's got something to talk about.

text: Hayme Ana’ya da oraya gittiğimi dersin
english: Tell Hayme Ana I went there too.

text: Gece vakti ne işin var o kadının sofrasında?
english: What are you doing at that lady's table at night?
I'm looking for a piece of peace, sister.
It's just peace.
Staying away from you, from Halima

text: Bunu da mı çok görürsün bana?
english: You see that a lot, too?
The weakest part of us is to get his teeth through...
She's got nothing but trouble.
Do you think Aytolun
I'll find out at all costs.

text: Sevdiklerimi birer birer elimden almasına müsaade etmeyeceğim
english: I won't let him take away my loved ones one by one.
The syrup is very sour.
It's got a lot of taste in it.

text: Bey, içmemek için bahane mi ararsın?
english: Mister, are you looking for an excuse not to drink?
You're gonna drink the syrup...
...to attack his prey like a wild bull.
You made me crazy at my age.

text: Azgın boğa bu gece sana saldıracaktır
english: The horny bull will attack you tonight
Our guest has arrived.

text: Hayırlı akşamlar beyim Müsaade var mıdır?
english: Good evening, sir. May I?
Welcome, my daughter.
Have a seat.
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Here you go.
Salaam alaikum.

No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no. no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Dumrul, help me.
Ahh!

text: Yarın bütün hayvanların tam sayısını istiyorum Dumrul
english: Tomorrow I want the full number of all animals Dumrul
♪ Bulls, little boys ♪ ♪ All of 'em ♪
Yes, sir.
Let them also count the young that were born in the spring

text: Gelen tüccara onları satmamak en iyisi derim
english: I'd say it's best not to sell them to the merchant who comes in.

text: Savaştan sonra sürüyü büyütmek için onlara ihtiyacımız olacak
english: After the war, we'll need them to raise the herd.
You heard my mother.
Yes, sir.
Yes, sir. Thank you.
The table is ready, mother.
Oh, my God, thank you so much.
You've put us back together again.
You didn't leave our stove, our obama to the tyrant.
Praise be to Thee, O Lord.
Amen.

text: Bir zamanlar soframızda kaç boğaz doyardı
english: Once upon a time, how many mouths would eat at our table?

text: O günler yine gelecek inşallah ana
english: Those days will come again, Mother.
Inshallah.
Why didn't he come to me?
She wasn't hungry. She fell asleep.
And where is Gökçe?
Aytolin invited me to dinner.
He's gone to the tent.

text: Bir sofrada, bir aile bir değilse…
english: At a table, if a family isn't one...

text: …o oba da, boy da bir değildir
english: ...he's not the same as the oba, he's not the height.

text: Ne analığı becerebildim ne obamı ayakta tutabildim
english: I've never been able to be a mother, nor have I been able to keep my oba standing.
What kind of promise is that, Mom?

text: Her şey ortada güzel gözlü Selcan’ım
english: I'm a beautiful-eyed Selcan.
If there's no peace at a table...
...and no throats.
No throat, no unity
Thank you, sister-in-law.
Bon appétit, Gökçe
All this time...
Uh-huh.
...I've never...

text: Gökçe Bir şey mi oldu kızım?
english: Did something happen, girl?
Did we say something wrong?
No, no.

text: Ben sadece bunca vakittir bu kadar huzurlu yemek yememiştim
english: I just haven't had such a peaceful meal in so long.

text: Yaşadıklarınız hiç kolay değildi ki Gökçe
english: What you've been through hasn't been easy, Gökçe.
Then your brother Ertugrul...
...you've all been through a lot.
Hayme sent him into exile...
...made a good decision for all of us.
Isn't that right, Gökçe?
You're right, sister-in-law.
I hope he doesn't come back with more trouble.

text: Oğuzlar en dar günlerinde bile mutlaka bir çıkış yolu bulmuşlardır
english: The Oğuz have found a way out even in their narrowest days.

text: İki obanın birleşmesi yüce Allah’ın bir lütfu
english: The union of two obas is a blessing from Almighty God.

text: Bize düşen de bu lütfun kıymetini bilmek
english: And it's up to us to appreciate it.

text: Birlikteliğimiz Ertuğrul’la kaim değildir Korkut Bey’im
english: We are not together with Ertugrul.

text: Bize düşen, Kayılarla Dodurgalıların kan bağını…
english: It is our duty to bind the bloodlines of the apricots and the Dodurga.
...stitching the link to the ritual.
Then no one can stand in front of us
Dinner's ready, sir.
Let's see if you like it.
Do you like it, sir?
Nice work, Brother Turgut.
You've done better than Halima Sultan.

text: Aman beyim Halime Hatun bunu duymasın
english: Don't let Halima Hatun hear about this.
I'll get in trouble.

text: Ulan Turgut kardeş Aykız bacım neler belletmiş sana böyle
english: Brother Turgut, what did my sister teach you?
Sit down, brother.
Sit down and eat.

text: Aykız bacım ölmemiştir Turgut kardeş Her daim bizimledir
english: Sister Aysdým is not dead. Sister Turgut is always with us.
My sister is a martyr.
I know, sir. I know. I know.
If you knew, you wouldn't be sorry.
If you knew, you wouldn't have to suffer like this.

text: İnşallah gün gelir sen de şehit olursun da…
english: Hopefully one day you'll be a martyr.
...you'll meet my sister.
Inshallah.
You're right, sir.
You're right.
I'll take it out of my heart
Sir, what's an obada?
They blamed you, too.
They're not wrong.
That's why I don't make a sound.
For the Order of the Order...

text: …anadan, yardan, serden geçmeye yemin etmedik mi?
english: Didn't we swear to walk through the yard, through the yard?

text: Şimdi o yeminimiz bizden bedel ister
english: Now, that oath of ours is asking us for a price.

text: Korkut Bey’in otağı da çok bulutlu beyim
english: Mr. Korak's tent is too cloudy, sir.
My uncle must have lost his head.
In Tugtekin's heart, mad colts roam
She seems to have fallen in love with Gökçe

text: Dayımın otağının gören gözü Aytolun Hatun’dur
english: Aytolun Hatun is the eye of my uncle's tent
Every plague will come from that woman.
They think...

text: …Ertuğrul, Noyan’ın peşindedir o yüzden yaptıklarımızı görmez
english: Ertuğrul is after Noyan, so he doesn't see what we're doing.
They're wrong. It's not like that.
I'll see.

text: Aytolun Hatun bir yandan ağabeyim Gündoğdu’yu…
english: Aytolun Hatun, on the other hand, my brother Gündüldü...
...to draw him to his side...

text: …diğer yandan da Tuğtekin ile Gökçe’yi evlendirme azminde
english: ...on the other hand, in the determination to marry Tuğtekin and Gökçe.

text: Tuğtekin ile Gökçe’yi niye evlendirmek isterler ki beyim?
english: Why would they want to marry Tuğtekin and Gökçe?
Gökçe Hatun will have no children.

text: Aytolun Hatun eğer bu sırrı biliyorsa…
english: If Aytolun Hatun knows this secret...
...then he's got a target.
We'll find out soon enough.

text: Bundan gayrı kim bize tuzak kurmaya çalışırsa…
english: Other than that, whoever tries to set us up...
I'm going to take over the sky dome.

text: Ben artık müsaadenizi isteyeyim Geç oldu
english: I'll ask you to excuse me. It's late.
Always come, girl.

text: Yüce Allah’ım bana kız evlat vermedi Ama sen kızım gibi gel
english: Good God didn't give me a daughter, but you come like my daughter.
Bring joy to our home
Thank you, sir.
Come on, I'll take you to your tent.
Good evening.
Good evening, my daughter.
Ahh!
What happens next?

text: Hangi kız Tuğtekin gibi yiğit bir erkeğe hayır der beyim?
english: What girl would say no to a brave man like Tugtekin, sir?

text: Hayırlısıyla Erzurum yolunda çözülecek bu iş
english: It'll all work out well for Erzurum.

text: Peki bu evliliği sen neden bu kadar istemektesin Aytolun?
english: And why do you want this marriage so badly, Aytolun?
It's a matter of the union of two obans...
...will be resolved by the marriage of these young people.
Apricots love...

text: …Korkut Bey’in oğlu Tuğtekin perçinleyecektir de ondan
english: Because Tuğtekin, the son of Beyteh, will rive him.
You're the one who's scared

text: Buranın kışı serttir Bu kış hepimiz için çok zor olacak
english: The winter here is hard This winter will be very difficult for all of us
What do you think you're doing, Gökçe?

text: Aynı otağda karımın çocuklarımın yüzüne bakarken…
english: When I was looking at my wife's face in the same room...
How am I supposed to bear to see you in the same room?

text: Zamansız bir vicdan azabı gibi nasıl taşıyacağım seni?
english: How am I supposed to carry you like an untimely conscience?
Gökçe?
What?
Winter.
When one is at peace with one's loved ones...
Who cares about the cold?
Good night, Aunt.
You too, Tugtekin.

text: Niye bana Korkut Beylere yemeğe gideceğini söylemedin Gökçe kızım?
english: Why didn't you tell me you were going to dinner with the Scare Boys, Gökçe girl?
I told my sister Hayme Ana

text: Bir daha sefere bana da dersin
english: Next time you'll tell me

text: Belli ki Korkut Beyler seni el üstünde tutarlar
english: It's obvious the Scare Boys will keep you in line.
Good night, sir. Good night.
You've heard that the Kayi Alps are very restless.

text: Ertuğrul gittikten sonra daha da huzursuz oldular
english: After Ertuğrul left, they became more restless.
I know. I still know.

text: Hiçbir obanın Alpleri onlar kadar cenge girmedi
english: No one's Alps have fought as hard as they have.

text: Her zaman düşmanlarımızın karşısında dimdik durdular
english: They've always stood up to our enemies.
I've got my son.

text: Alplerimi savaş meydanında sana emanet ettim
english: I entrusted you with my Alps on the battlefield.
Don't ever break them again.

text: Ertuğrul abim gittiğine göre bundan gayrı mesele çıkmayacak hala
english: Since Ertugrul is gone, there'll still be no more trouble.

text: Ve kimlerin hain olduğunu er geç öğreneceğiz. Merak etme
english: And we'll soon find out who's the traitor.

text: Ve şunu da bilmeni isterim ki…
english: And I want you to know...

text: …ne seni ne de o yiğitleri kırmak istemem
english: I don't want to hurt you or those braves.
I hope so.
Good night, son.
Good night, Aunt.
What will I do with you, Selcan?
You're my master.
Whatever you're about to do
I shouldn't have laid a hand on you.

text: Sana da, kendime de bu ayıbı yaşatmamam gerekirdi, bilirim. Lakin…
english: I know I shouldn't have put you and me through this, but...
I'd die for you
It's your decision.
It's my duty to obey.
As long as you make up your mind
What you did to me in the past...
I'll never forget what you did to our room, Selcan.
I forgot, when I said I was cold inside...
...you'll do a job and remind me again.

text: Bir de o vesveselerin yok mu?
english: And don't you have those delusions?
Your unprovoked anger against my uncle, Tuğtekin, Aytolun,
Not without reason, my lord.

text: Öyle saf bir yüreğin var ki…
english: You have such a pure heart...
You can't see what's going on the way I see it.

text: Obanın geleceği için dayının, ağasının gözünün içine bakarsın. Göremezsin
english: You look your uncle in the eyes of his Agha for the future of the Oban, and you can't see it.
Oh, patience.
To me, to my presence...
...the breath I'm breathing...
...the warmth on your floor...

text: …hiçbir şeyime tahammülün kalmamıştır değil mi Gündoğdu?
english: ...you couldn't stand anything, could you, Gündüz?
Hold on to the evil in you, Selcan.

text: Dizginle ki bir daha obaya bela getirmeyesin
english: Put your backs into it so you don't bring trouble to the Obama again.
No, if you bring trouble again...
...you'll pay for it this time.

text: Gayrı da sana başka lafım yoktur
english: Other than that, I have nothing more to say to you.
I'm afraid of losing my way

text: Yol da, sır da emanetin içinde gizlidir Ertuğrul
english: The way and the secret are hidden inside the trust, Ertuğrul
What's the good of it?
The trust is calling me.
Listen to me carefully.

text: Noyan asıl Moğol ordusu gelene kadar
english: Until Noyan's original Mongolian army arrives
He collects information about this land.

text: Küçük, vurucu darbelerle bizi yıldırmak ister
english: He wants to intimidate us with small, striking blows.
Such a fool.
We need to get the oba on its feet.
Turgut
Born
You'll be back in the Oba.

text: Obaya döner dönmez Artuk'la Deli Demir'le irtibata geçin
english: Contact Artuk and Mad Iron as soon as he returns to Obaya.
Just be careful.
Tugtekin will want to trap you.
That's why.
Or sneak in.

text: ya da girmek için iyi bir neden bulun
english: Or find a good reason to get in.
Understood, sir.
In the name of Allah, we'll take care of it.
When you enter the Oba
The flying bird must be asked of you
Everybody's a suspect.

text: Ben Tuğtekin'in Alp'i Kocabaş'tan şüphe ederim beyim
english: I doubt Tuğtekin's Alps Big Head, sir.
Then whoever you suspect
Don't let him out of your sight.
And don't make a fuss in the Obada.
Did we find the traitor in the Oba?
We can trap Noyan.
What about me, sir?

text: Senin görevinde ölmek var, dönmek yok
english: Your duty is to die, no turning back.
I'm sending you to hell, Abdurrahman.
Don't you dare give up.
Don't make a mistake.
If you make a mistake
We may never see you again.

text: Bu göreve canım feda olsun beyim
english: May my life be sacrificed for this mission, my lord.
I hope God is with me.
Inshallah.
Try to turn Hamza's mind back.
Try to win his blacking heart

text: Bize hemen haber uçurmak zorunda değilsin
english: You don't have to tell us right away.
First, win Noyan's trust.
And what are you going to do, sir?
I'm going to get my trust.
It's time to go, brothers and sisters.

text: Bundan sonra düşmanın ümüğüne çökme vaktidir
english: From now on, it's time to fall into the enemy's fold.
Here we go.
There's dying, there's no turning back
Give me your blessing.
Well done, sir.
Well done, sir.
Well done, sir.

text: Eğer benim de sizde hakkım varsa
english: If I'm entitled to yours
That's all right.
Here we go.
O Allah!
Ertugrul is furious that he escaped.

text: Senin de parçalarına ayırıp çakallara yem yapmasın, ha?
english: Don't let him tear you apart and feed you to the coyotes, huh?
Don't worry.

text: Baycu Noyan'ın dilinden en iyi ben anlarım
english: I know the language of Baycu Noyan best.
Baycu Noyan
Baycu Noyan
I'm at your service.

text: Bizans'a kadar bütün bu topraklar bizim olacak
english: All this land will be ours until Byzantine.
Efrasiab
Erzurum, Malatya, Kolya, Alaiye, all of it.

text: Hepsinin ticaretinden payını almak istersin değil mi?
english: You want your share of the trade, don't you?
I'm a merchant.
Of course I do.
Very much so.

text: Hayal bile edemeyeceğin kadar fazla kazanacaksın
english: You'll make more than you can imagine.
But first you and I have work to do.
Efrasiab
To the Dodurgas with the recordings
We're going to do what they don't see in their lives.
Now that Ertuğrul has escaped,
Since we can't find him
Well, in that case,
He'll come after us.
I'm gonna get down on my knees
He'll beg you to kill me.
I'm ready for you, Mr. Noyan.
Until Itemday's army arrives

text: her biri iliklerine kadar Moğol'dan korkacak
english: Each one will fear the Mongol to the bone.

text: Onları bir lokma ekmeğe muhtaç edeceğiz
english: We're gonna need them for a bite of bread.
First of all, we're gonna cash them in.
Then each one of them will be devastated.
They won't have the power to feed the Alps.
Your servant is very skilled.
♪ Won't keep your head down ♪
Then let's get moving.
Until you're at your limit
May our soldiers accompany you.
So far, we haven't found a trace.
Take off today, too.

text: Dağ, taş, ne varsa arayın Kocabaş
english: Mountain, stone, search for anything, Sasquatch.

text: Yakaladığınız anda da tepelerine binin Anlaşıldı mı?
english: As soon as you catch them, get on top of them, all right?
Yes, sir.
And if you do,
Don't feel sorry for him.

text: Bir daha obada mesele çıkarmalarına izin vermeyeceğiz
english: We're not gonna let them make trouble in the Oba again.
At dawn in this room
As the sun sets
Food is eaten.
These dishes are ready for the brides.

text: Ben erimin olmadığı yemekleri zehir bilirim
english: I know how to poison food without a private.

text: Onsuz yemek hazırlamayı zül kabul ederim
english: Without him, I'll take it as a punishment to make dinner.
♪ Turn your face to me ♪
I said turn around!
Halima, don't try my patience!

text: Bir tek senin kocan mı acı çekti?
english: Is your husband the only one who suffered?
Huh?
Are you the only one who's hurt?
All these women have been martyred.
Turgut lost Aygirl
None of them were as whiny as you.

text: Benim erim canını feda ettiği obasından anası tarafından kovuldu
english: My soldier was fired by his mother from the obama he had sacrificed his life for.
Left to die
It wasn't his mother who banished him.

text: Onu sürgün eden Kayı Boyu'nun Hatunu Hayme Hatun'du
english: He was banished by Kayyi Boy's Lady Hayme Hatun
He's not your husband either.
The Alps of that Kayı Boy was Ertuğrul

text: Eğer bey hatunu olacaksan önce bunu belleyesin
english: If you're going to be a gentleman's girl, you should know that first.
From now on
It's in the tent.
If you ever show me your tongue again
I know how to cut that tongue.

text: De hele, derdin nedir Selcan Hatun?
english: What's your problem, Selcan Hatun?
I only have one problem, Aytolun.
That's you.

text: O hasta kafandan yine neler geçiyor?
english: What's going on in that sick head of yours?

text: Asıl senin o tekinsiz kafandan neler geçer kim bilir?
english: Who knows what's going on in that haunted mind of yours?
What do you want from my sister?
You put your nails on, you won't let go.
Tell me what's wrong with you, huh?
What's wrong with you?
Know your place, Selcan.
You're a refuge in my husband's room.

text: Tıpkı kocanın çadırında bir sığıntı olduğun gibi
english: Just like you were a refuge in your husband's tent.
Ah!
And you're the centipede in my uncle's bosom!
A centipede with a crush on his head!
Let go!
Aytolun Hatun

text: Allah aşkına, ne dediğini bilmez o
english: For God's sake, he doesn't know what he's talking about.
Put your dagger down.
Let go!
I'll kick his ass!
I'm gonna kick your ass, for God's sake.

text: Sen ne dediğini bilir misin Gündoğdu?
english: Do you know what you're saying?
Shut up already!
What do you think of me, sunshine?

text: Kız kardeşimi eline geçirmesine izin vermeyeceğim!
english: I won't let him get his hands on my sister!
Selcan!
Ah!
Get out, get out!
I'll see you in the tent.
Get out!
Aytolun Hatun
For God's sake.
Let's keep this between the three of us.

text: İki otağ arasında ikilik çıksın istemeyiz. Ha?
english: We don't want a two-way between the two tents.
She's a sick woman.
Forgive me for saying that.
But it's the truth.
That's why.
Let's keep this between us.

text: Lakin o kadını benden uzak tut
english: But keep that woman away from me
Otherwise
I'll never shut up again.

text: Ne verdin Aytolun denen o şirretin eline?
english: What did you give to that bitch Aytol?
Tell me.
Is that strong syrup?
Say it!
Kudret syrup, ma'am.

text: Korkut gibi hasta adamı kevgire çevirmez mi o şurup?
english: Doesn't that syrup turn a sick man into a creep?
Eygish!
Won't it, Selcan Hatun?
Selcan!
Selcan!
Where the hell are you, woman?
Shh!
You were so right, Selcan.
I can't stand you anymore.
To your presence, to your breath
Your warmth on my mattress, nothing!
Nothing!
Ya!
So you're our prey today.
Who are you?
I'm the Alpine of the Alpine brain.
My name is Abdurrahman Alp
What are you looking for around here?
Hamza Alp and Noyan
I've come to talk to them.
What are you gonna talk to them about?

text: Duydum ki Kayı'nın erleri onlarla bir olmuş
english: I've heard that the men of Kayi are one with them.
I've come to pledge my allegiance to them.
To pledge?
It's hard for those who want to commit
Let's see what your fate will be.
Put down your sword
Drop your sword!
Tie him up.
Hah!
Ho!
Let's get some rest here.
Oh!
I'm hungry.
Brother Ula
And you won't be able to eat.

text: O yediklerin nerene gidiyor Boğaç ha?
english: Where's that going, Bully, huh?
Let's set the table.

text: Ben de yakacak bir şeyler bulayım, ha?
english: I'll find something to burn, huh?
Brother Yahu
I just don't get it.

text: Bir Alp, bir Alp'e kılıç çeker mi?
english: Would an Alps draw a sword on an Alps?
How are we supposed to slaughter them now?
We've opened our table for them.
We've been through a lot.

text: Hele onları bir ele geçirelim o vakit gör ne oluyor
english: Let's take them and see what happens.

text: Birazdan sizi bırakacağız Yolu bulabilir misiniz?
english: We'll be leaving soon. Can you find the way?
Efrasiyab finds every way
There are Turkmen ahead.
Huh.

text: Kılıçlarımız ne vakittir kan tadına bakmadı
english: How long has our swords not tasted blood?
Don't come back empty-handed.
Let's take a present to Noyan.
Get ready.
Come on, Bismillah.
Oh, boy.
Brother
Welcome.
Thank you.
You were right.

text: Süleyman Şah'ın evlatları için ömrümüzü boşa harcamışız
english: We wasted our lives on the children of Solomon Shah.
So you're the Alps of Solomon Shah.
Abdurrahman Alp
I've been looking for you in the mountains for days.
I've come to obey you.
Baycu Noyan

text: Güçlünün, cihanın gördüğü en büyük ordunun arasına hoş geldin
english: Welcome to the greatest army the mighty have ever seen.
Abdurrahman
Hamza
I want you to host your brother.
Thanks.
We found it on the ground looking for it in the sky.
Ah!
Ha!
Ya-ah!
God bless you, brothers.

text: Bundan gayri size bir can borcumuz vardır
english: We owe you a life beyond that.
What are you doing here?
What are you doing here?

text: Moğol zulmünden kurtarmak için gariban arardık
english: We'd seek the poor to rid the Mongolian tyranny
Oh, we found it.
Tell me about it.
How could you escape when you were about to be executed?

text: Hâlâ obamızda adaleti bilen kimselerin yardımıyla
english: With the help of those who still know justice in our obama
Mother Hayme with Ertugrul
How could they let you be executed?

text: Onlara verdiğim tüm emekler haram olsun
english: All the work I've given them is forbidden.
Ertuğrul
He sold me out so he wouldn't break the law.
The day will come
I'll take revenge on them.
Brother Abdurrahman

text: gün gelecek o obanın beyi ben olacağım
english: Someday I'll be the master of that oban
Then the price of what has been done to us
We'll make them pay one at a time.
We have to find the Bull.
You all right, brother?
I'm fine, bro. I'm fine.
He saved my life.
Persian merchant Efrasiab
Come with us to the club.
Let's tell Mr. Tugtekin what happened.

text: Hem böylece Tuğtekin Bey'im de sizin hain olmadığınızı anlamış olur
english: That way, Mr. Tugtekin will know you're not a traitor.
Mr. Gündüz, you have to change your shoes.

text: Ne icap ediyorsa yapın o vakit
english: Then do what you have to do.
Dumrul, bring it to me when you're ready.
Yes, sir.
Well, good luck with that.
What's up, man?
The horse's shoes are going to change.
What do you do?
I talked to the locals.
They're pretty nervous about the winter.
Allah is great.

text: Beklediğimiz Acem tüccarı hele bir gelsin
english: The Persian merchant we've been waiting for.
We'll go to the caravan
Are you still mad at me?
I'm angry, of course.
Why?

text: Çünkü sen de kardeşim Ertuğrul gibi
english: Because you're like my brother Ertugrul
You move without thinking about the front or the back
That's why it's your head, too.
Oban won't get out of trouble either.
So you've caught the traitors.
Sir
They saved us from Mongolia.
What happened? What happened?
Mongols attacked
And they saved us, sir.

text: Ben sana önünü, ardını düşünmezsin demiştim
english: I told you not to think about the front or the back.
So it's the Alps that are going to catch the traitors.
Saved by traitors, huh?
And who is this man?
I am Efrasiab, the Persian merchant.
Welcome.
Welcome.
Turgut Alp!
Born Alpine!
Where is Mr. Ertugrul?
He sends his regards to you, Halima Sultan.
He didn't come?
He didn't show.
Then where is he?
He didn't tell us where he was going.

text: Ne demek gittiği yeri bize de söylemedi?
english: What do you mean he didn't tell us where he was going?

text: Siz onu o halde bırakıp da nasıl obaya gelirsiniz Turgut?
english: How can you leave him like that and come to the office, Turgut?
You couldn't say stop?

text: Beyim bizsiz bir yere gidemezsin diyemediniz mi?
english: Sir, couldn't you have said you couldn't go anywhere without us?

text: Onunla birlikte ölüme gitmekten mi korktunuz?
english: Were you afraid to go to death with him?
Even the moongirl is more brave than you.
And you'll be the Alps.

text: Biz de uzun zamandır yolunuzu gözlerdik
english: We've been waiting for you for a long time.
You know, it's dangerous everywhere.
We'll travel slowly.
Where's your caravan?
I'll go first.
If I don't smell bad
My caravan will come
Thanks.
This tent has been assigned to you.
Rest up, enjoy yourselves.
I'll meet you in the evening and we'll talk.
Gratitude
It's a tough job, Persian merchant.
It's very hard.

text: Siz ne beceriksiz, ne ahmak Alplersiniz!
english: What a clumsy, foolish Alps you are!

text: Öldürün diye gönderdiğim adamlar sizin hayatını kurtarıyor!
english: The men I sent to kill save your life!
Sir, we've been caught off guard.
Why didn't you just die?
Now the whole oba's heard about it.
You have soiled your master's name.
Sir, we couldn't predict the Mongols.
They weren't traitors.
We owe lives.
You owe me a life, huh?

text: O vakit onun yerine senin canını alayım da
english: Then I'll take your life instead.
You pay them what you owe them.
Ah!
Ah!
Ah!
You're not alive!
Sir
Sir
Is there a sign, Hayme?
There is, brother. There is.
The Alps of Ertugrul have returned.
Yeah.

text: Peşinden gönderdiğiniz Alplerinizi de kurtararak dönmüş
english: And he returned, saving the Alps you sent after him.
I know.
You're upset with me Hayme
And you're right.
But

text: ben de obamın huzuru için bunları yapmak zorundayım
english: That's what I have to do for the peace of my oba.

text: Ben biçare vaziyette olan evladımı buradan kovdum
english: I kicked my poor child out of here.
You couldn't tell your son to stop.
♪ And once upon a time ♪

text: anamın ve yengemin hüküm sürdüğü bu otağda
english: In this tent where my mother and sister-in-law rule
Now he doesn't know.

text: diline sahip çıkmaz bir kadın oturur
english: A woman who doesn't hold her tongue sits
And you should know that.

text: Aytolun, beni hayata yeniden döndüren kadındır
english: Aytolun is the woman who brought me back to life.
The respect I've been given
It should be shown to him.
Now.
Let's leave all this.
I'd say

text: iki oba arasında bir yuva kuralım
english: Let's build a nest between the two obas.
That's my rule.
Our brotherhood is perfect.
Home?
Whose home is this supposed to be?
The home of Tugtekin and Gökçe

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im obada hain var dedi
english: Mr. Ertugrul said there's a traitor in the Obada.
We used to suspect Big Head, but
We saved him from the Mongol.

text: Yılanı deliğinden çıkarmak da bize düştü
english: It's up to us to get the snake out of the hole.
Where is our Mr. Ertugrul?
He said he's going to get the stuff.
Did he say he's going to get it?
Yes, Master Iron.
And what will make you know what it is?
When they ask, "Where is the country?"

text: atalarımızın mezarının olduğu her yer diye cevap vermiştim sana
english: I told you where our ancestors were buried.
The day will come

text: senin mezarının olduğu bu topraklar vatanımız olacak baba
english: This land of yours will be our homeland, Father.

text: Senin o mübarek ayağına toz bulaşan her yol
english: Any road that gets dust on your blessed foot.
Wherever my sword reaches
Every square inch of land

text: soyumuzun ve İslam ümmetinin vatanı olacak
english: It will be the home of our generation and the nation of Islam.
I didn't hesitate.
I won't.
It's like you told me.
Hesitant

text: yiğidin diri diri toprağa girdiği gündür
english: The Day when the mighty shall enter the living land,
What about me?

text: ne de Kayıları canlı canlı toprağa gömmelerine izin vermeyeceğim
english: Nor will I let them bury the apricots alive.

text: Ne yapacağımı, ne edeceğimi çok iyi bilirim baba
english: I know exactly what to do, what to do, Dad.
But
Hearts to break
For the blood of a brother to flow
I came to ask you to forgive me.
Until I see that blessed state
I just want you to know that I'm going to fight non-stop.

text: Uzun yola çıkmaya hüküm giydim beyim
english: I've been sentenced to a long journey, sir.
Give me your blessing, Dad.
We'll give the goods to the goods.
The Futüvetlı are waiting for you.
Are you ready to take the job?
